attributes.action: Stop victimising people who urgently need operations and allow operations now.
attributes.additional_details: People who need urgent surgery are in horrendous pain, in danger of becoming addicted to painkillers, living very limited lives and many have mental health issues because this seems to be going on indefinitely.
attributes.background: Open hospital doors to those who are desperate for operations.

rejection.details:
Decisions about the provision of medical treatment during the current outbreak is a matter for NHS England and individual NHS trusts, and not the Government or Parliament.

Since you started your petition, the NHS has set out plans to safely bring back routine operations: https://www.england.nhs.uk/2020/05/nhs-roadmap/

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ensure speedy access to diagnostics and treatment for non-covid patients: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549642
